About.title: About me
About.bioP1: I'm a Software Engineer from Barcelona specialized in web and mobile development.
About.bioP2: I enjoy all kind of coding challenges and when not working I'm always geeking out on something!

1.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed web components, dialogs and widgets using Java and AEM framework (Adobe).
On the Front End side I used HTML5, SASS, Javascript, Backbone and jQuery.
International and Agile environment.

2.title: C++ Software Engineer
description: I developed digital gambling games using C++ and a game engine called Irrlicht.
I worked on some physics components for the games (collisions and movement).
Scrum environment.

3.title: Java Software Engineer
description: I developed Java services and worked on a base CMS framework that other teams would use to create websites.
I took care of the code reviews of the external team and the management of the releases for our framework.
I wrote technical specifications and documentation for the services I developed.
I developed all the Jenkins CI/CD infrastructure for the team and to automatize the releases.
I did presentations, workshops and training about Jenkins for the rest of the team.
Agile environment with Kanban methodology.

4.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed REST applications with Spring to retrieve data from the DBs.
On the FE side I used React to display the information on the company's website.
I used Redis on the BE to cache and speed up the retrieval of data.
I took care of upgrading the old polling system to display real time prices of the stock market, using WebSockets to stream the data.
I created a fake prices simulator using docker to aid on the debugging and testing of the data streaming.
I did load testing of the new system using Gatling.
Agile and Kanban methodology.

5.title: Software Engineer
description: I developed mobile applications using Dart and Flutter.
I took some trainings on iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin).
I developed my own portfolio website using NextJS and React.
Bachelor's degree in Aerospace Engineering (not finished)
Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering
